00102  * AVR expected

00124 #include <netinet/in.h>
00125 #include <netinet/ip.h>
00126 #include <netinet/udp.h>
00127 #include <netinet/ipcsum.h>
00128 #include <net/route.h>
00129 #include <sys/socket.h>
00130 
00135 
00152 int NutUdpOutput(UDPSOCKET * sock, uint32_t daddr, uint16_t port, NETBUF * nb)
00153 {
00154     uint32_t saddr;
00155     uint32_t csum;
00156     UDPHDR *uh;
00157     NUTDEVICE *dev;
00158     IFNET *nif;
00159 
00160     if ((nb = NutNetBufAlloc(nb, NBAF_TRANSPORT, sizeof(UDPHDR))) == 0)
00161         return -1;
00162 
00163     uh = nb->nb_tp.vp;
00164     uh->uh_sport = sock->so_local_port;
00165     uh->uh_dport = htons(port);
00166     uh->uh_ulen = htons((uint16_t)(nb->nb_tp.sz + nb->nb_ap.sz));
00167 
00168     /*
00169      * Get local address for this destination.
00170      */
00171     if ((dev = NutIpRouteQuery(daddr, &saddr)) != 0) {
00172         nif = dev->dev_icb;
00173         saddr = nif->if_local_ip;
00174     } else
00175         saddr = 0;
00176 
00177     uh->uh_sum = 0;
00178     csum = NutIpPseudoChkSumPartial(saddr, daddr, IPPROTO_UDP, uh->uh_ulen);
00179     csum = NutIpChkSumPartial(csum, uh, sizeof(UDPHDR));
00180     uh->uh_sum = NutIpChkSum(csum, nb->nb_ap.vp, nb->nb_ap.sz);
00181 
00182     return NutIpOutput(IPPROTO_UDP, daddr, nb);
00183 }
